summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Sixth Avenue Northeast, in the City of Seattle, from East Forty-fifth Street to Pacific Place, by constructing a sewer therein, together with all wyes, manholes, catch basins, flush tanks and other appurtenances, in accordance with Resolution No. 450 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
